q: Today, Nokia and Microsoft intend to enter into a strategic alliance,'' Stephen Elop said in the video, a precursor of a turnaround plan he's set to detail later today at an analyst conference in London. Together, we will bring consumers a new mobile experience, with stellar hardware, innovative software, and great services. We will create opportunities beyond anything that currently exists. Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer said the partnership ''brings the brands mobile consumers want, like Bing, Office, and of course Xbox Live.'' Stephen Elop Shankland Full Profile

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. ''Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.

But conservatives counter that the 2010 election outcome showed he is precisely the kind of political figure to put forth as the face of the Republican Party. If I was starting a football team in a national budget league, I'd pick Paul Ryan as the captain and quarterback, said Sen. Bernie Sanders Dan Lungren ( R., Calif.), an ally of the late Mr. Jack Kemp . ''There's nobody in this House who's taken as serious a long-term view on the budget as Paul Ryan.''
